recovery_stages.action:
Verify HIL-T Operator Multi-Factor Credentials and Authorization Level against GEIDM.
Mandates CRoT attestation of HIL-T session start.

Diagnostic analysis of last CALS entry and identification of fault source Fsrc.
CRoT confirms environment state immutability during diagnosis.
HIL-T operator selects recovery path. Critical path changes require GAX sign-off.

CRoT signing of the recovery attempt, establishing the new state genesis (Ψ'N).
Mandatory NRALS entry prior to release of system lock.
